message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and the value it brings, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that truly stands out in its category. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences, so we can proceed with the transaction.
